message: www.MakeVolu.me feel free to sign up for beta, I'd love all of your feedback once we launch beta.
what this? music site
It is a music site, however were not telling anyone anything more than that for now.
ok will sign up for beta

i get this Your Referral URL is http://makevolu.me/?r=oh Click To Share Link
Refer 3 people in order get early access.
Refer 10 people and get access to Beta when it releases.
Refer the most people and get a exclusive in depth interview before Beta release
do i need 10 before i can access it
shared it on FB
10 is Beta for reg users, for the HN community as long as they sign up they get an invite early
very curious :)
tweeted about it
Thank you, if you enjoy music I think you'll really enjoy it.
or why would I share it with friends if I don't know what it is.
what is makevolu.me?
@taffylafaguz Signed up through your link.  Good luck!
I hate betas like this. its like a ponzi scheme, but nobody gets money. just website hits.
@dabent thanks

@orenmazor If we wanted hits we would spam this to the 700k+ users of one of our facebook aps. I'm only really targeting the dev community and a few musicians right now. Like the name gives clue to, it revolves around music.
How will you know which users from the HN community? (Also, I signed up through @taffylafaguz 's referral link. Mine's http://makevolu.me/?r=qfq )
@Jevans We've only shared it with the dev community so far, I find that most of the early adopters and friends of early adopters are developers who are curious.
@Jevans When the signup page launches it will have a VIP Code section were everyone who has signed up so far will be emailed a early access code.
Were blogging now https://makevolume.wordpress.com
@hijimayor Thanks for the critique, I'll make that change as soon as I get to a computer.

The message after signup 
"    * Refer 3 people in order get early access.
    * Refer 10 people and get access to Beta when it releases.
    * Refer the most people and get a exclusive in depth interview before Beta release." makes it sound like you are desperate ... why not just leave it at "Refer 3 ppl to get early access"
making "people" to "friends" would be better ? softer wording
